name: Amanda
text: I'm originally from Ohio. While we may not be known for Italian cuisine or pizza, but it's something I happen to love from my area. Since moving to Louisiana,  I have yet to find a pizza I am in love with. Well, that search ended tonight. I …More

name: M W
text: Ordered from Italian Pie because it was near the hotel we stayed at, and there was a flyer with their menu on it in our room.  On the back was a menu to China Express... first red flag.  Called in order and lady with thick Asian accent …More

name: greg for Trump
text: COMPLETELY AMAZING WE LOVE THIS PLACE ITS ALL GOOD AND VERY FRIENDLY THE LASAGNA IS AMAZING AND ONLY IN AMERICA WOULD YOU FIND AMAZING ORIENTALS COOK ITALIAN FOOD!! WE LOVE IT!!!

name: starri eustis
text: This is my second time doing delivery. This is very good food. I had chicken marsala, salad, & peanutbutter pie. So good! Had to come back again.

name: d j
text: I get the vegetarian pizza OMG so delicious. Friendly staff. Make sure your order is right.

name: Mary Crowe
text: The Bourbon wings were the absolute BEST wings I have ever had. We stayed at the Drury hotel and our food was delivered via door dash. The bbq chicken pizza was awesome too! It’s a little pricey but worth every cent! Please order the wings you will not regret it!

name: Lee Wagoner
text: Had the Cajun Pizza with wheat crust. Something tasted REALLY sour and the toppings were beyond scarce. For almost 20$ for a pizza, I wouldn’t have paid 5$ for this pizza. The company is also really quiet when contacting them on social media. Don’t waste your money.

name: Nickie Downey
text: It's just a lil' hole in the wall but the people are friendly. The beer is good and cold. I had one of their pizza's,  thought it would be like Domino's instead it was great! Mozzarella sticks good. Looking around I seen their sandwiches …More

name: Destinyba A
text: Omg! Delicious! Only 1 lady was serving 6 tables and she still was amazing! The food is delicious, big portions, and fresh! Definitely a new spot for us!

name: That Guy
text: Um... this place was mediocre Pizza. Not bad Pizza mind you or not good pizza, it was just mediocre Pizza. It's like if you were at a no-name joint and you ordered the best pizza in the house and you were like hey I'm not mad at this pizza then this would be where you are at.

name: James Warren
text: The breading for the calzone was delicious, however the meats and texture that were inside the calzone did not have a stand out flavor to me.

name: Sylvie S.
text: Not impressed. This is my first time ordering from there. The shrimp salad is sad. Very sad.

name: Tara
text: Good food for a good price, calzones are huge

name: pressley darst
text: super super nice staff!! AMAZING pizza!

name: Andrew Neri
text: Best Pizza in BR without a doubt.

name: kaya
text: I come here quite often as it is close to my house, I usually come with a friend and let me tell you... WOW. I haven been to some high quality restaurants and Italian Pie absolutely beats them all from price to quality, and most definitely …More

name: Megann Wither
text: Good value!

name: murt rupp
text: My wife and I had gotten the spinach lasagna seems like this dish had gotten smaller and had no flavor at all. Sorry will NOT be coming back to the Italian Pie ( very poor food )

name: Luke Hill
text: Food was good. The only thoroughly strange thing is I think they had plumbing problems, as a very... strong... smell permeated the restaurant without an obvious cause. I hope it's not a recurring problem.

name: Gina Minor
text: Delicious food. Every thing we ordered was so good. Great salads, our portions were really large for a very inexpensive price. Super nice staff. Forgot about this little place on George O'Neal, but we will be visiting again soon.

name: Tori Sylvest
text: Great food at reasonable prices. The owners are amazing!

name: Alan Hill
text: Fast hot and fresh. Very good foid

name: Pam White
text: Calzone was hot and so good... service was great. Another great dinner!

name: Christina Church
text: Ordering online was great. But the food was not the best quality. I ordered shrimp scampi and chicken marsala. Both pasta dishes came with choice of salad and choice of bread which is great but not enough sauce or mushrooms for the pasta and the scampi sauce was sooo thick like a chicken and dumpling gravy.

name: Lesli Nodurft
text: Always great food! I recommend the chicken or shrimp Florentine calzone.

name: dot Sweeney
text: Coming from up north with eating NewYork and Philly pizza, wow I was quite surprised how good the pizza was

name: Heather Jennings
text: The garlic bread and caesar salad are amazing!  Pizza is also fantastic.  Everything is very with good quality ingredients at a really good price.  A family owned and run restaurant.  Service is always excellent, too.   We love it!

name: Blake Cotton
text: Food was very good! The service was a bit slow.

name: berta zweifel
text: Terrific selection of pizzas with lots of toppings. Not gingy and you will definitely walk out full. There pasta dishes are enough for people to split and one pizza will definitely feed 3 to 4 people. Only the spinach dip was a bit thin and ordinary.  The decor is rather awful so perhaps not a "date" place, better for take out.

name: Julie Collier
text: The environment was dirty and not clean at all. My family are loyal Italian Pie customers but this location we won’t be returning. The food was ok, I give it about 6/10. Nothing seemed “made in-house”, it all tasted like warmed frozen food. …More

name: Chad Jones
text: good lunch great price

name: Never Told
text: My favorite Italian place around town for lunch. Calzones are huge, sandwiches are the best with that perfect poboy bread... I haven't had anything but good luck here. The food is simply great and as a plus it won't break the bank.

name: Trevor Domino
text: Great food and friendly service! Pizza is the best in town.

name: Wendy Timmons
text: Very good pizza!! My husband and I have been searching for pizza like we would get back home. This pizza is very close. It actually maybe better.The customer service is superior. For the best pizza around call them.

name: Eric with Anytime Electrical Service
text: If you are hesitant don't be. Everything was delicious and hot. Calzone was loaded with meat! It was extremely quiet other than the television playing. The hostess was  our waiter, she was really attentive and nice. The calzone was large enough for two! Worth the try, you won't regret it!

name: Jami Plaisance
text: Great food and Great Service!!

name: jessica bradley
text: Nice people. Love this place ❤️

name: Travis Kelly
text: Loved the food, great service.

name: Dmelle Chretien
text: If you want great tasting real pizza then look no further. Also the staff are also nice and attentive. My family's favorite pizzas are remembered by them!!

name: Bill Pruitt
text: The food is always great! The owners are the nicest people! Highly recommend!

name: Tommy Doran
text: My wife and I's quiet little Pizza place.  We love it.

name: Hunny Dew
text: Wonderful Spinach  and Artichoke Sandwich!

name: Mandy Lemmi
text: Excellent service and delicious hardy food.

name: Ashley Stuteville
text: We come here and get pizza to-go at least once a week! Their pizza is soooo amazing!!!!

name: Bobbie Barnes
text: Always excellent service and tgere pizza is outstanding

name: Alanna Andrekovic
text: This place is great they use fresh not frozen food!

name: Brian B
text: Good lasagna at a good price. Cheese bread was good as well as the salad. Very attentive service without being overbearing. Unassuming atmosphere but well worth the visit.

name: kim muhoberac
text: Well we ended up at this location because the other one in Baton Rouge closed. This place is as old as the hills and very dirty. The bathrooms were disgusting. I think the board of health needs to pay this place a visit.

name: Jeffrey Cowell
text: Family met here during the flood cleanup.  Great meal and service.  Also have good soup and salad; better than most.  Had a slice of Combo and All-Meat; quality toppings on both.

name: Tiffany P.
text:
Great customer service and very friendly!
If you're looking for a nice place that's not very loud and has good food. Then this is the place. The all meat pizza was good! So was the sergios shrimp pasta! I'd consider this a good comfort food spot! Also..the breadsticks are fabulous!

name: Wyatt Andrews
text: Excellent value for the price. Good pizza and calzones. The po boy sandwiches were a very pleasant surprise.  Do try it out.

name: Jack Boss
text:
I have to say after reading some of the reviews (which are all over the place) I broke down and ordered carry out Chicken Parmesan.
IT WAS DELICIOUS! I get why people aren't real impressed with the ambiance it is …More

name: Scott Williams
text: It's one of those little hole in the wall places that doesn't look like much on the outside but don't let that fool you. The inside is nice. The atmosphere is pleasant and laid back. The hostesses actually smile and are polite and courteous …More

name: R. Keith Williams
text: This is a mom and pop style restaurant where quality of service makes you feel at home and the flavor of the food makes you forget about any chain restaurant....and they deliver!

name: Silas Fowler
text: This is my favorite pizza place in Baton Rouge. Excellent pizza and great service.

name: Randall Garcia
text: For a Friday night, only one lady serving the small restaurant. The food didn't have any flavor to it. The bar wasn't open for business. I won't be going there again.

name: Wade Cantu
text: I've been going to this place for about over decade and I absolutely love it.

name: Patrick McCoy
text: This place isn't bad but the restaurant prices are expensive. Not to mention it's run by probably the same people who own the dry cleaners next door. They seem like nice people but the recipes they use are far from authentic Italian food.

name: Phillip Bible
text: It was good an every one nice an good serves

name: Daniel Quave
text: Really good food with big portions.

name: Kris B.
text: I loved the all meat pizza I was served. The employees, actually I think it were the owners were very friendly and prompt. I recommend this resteraunt.

name: Michael Moncrief
text: FOOD WAS GOOD ATMOSPHERE WAS ALRIGHT

name: Emily Hand
text: Food is delicious a d service is great. However the restaurant is due for an update. Also, the air has a general mugginess to it whenever I go.

name: Lindy Denham
text: Food good but portions have shrunk

name: Ellen Estevens
text: Large servings, friendly service

name: Mark Breaux
text: Love going here!  Owners are super friendly.  The value is great.

name: Ty'Rasha Johnson
text: I loveeee pizza, and this place has to be one of the best in Baton Rouge. Also, the lady who is always taking orders, etc. is very friendly.

name: Glenda Miller
text: Really Fast Service, Perfect Flavor on everything I tasted, Prices are very reasonable and they have Friendly staff.

name: Cheryl DiBenedetto
text: Good food, good service and great people

name: You thomad
text: This place advertise as the Italian pie but obviously it's not  anymore must be privately owned now the  food had absolutely NO seasoning!!! Never had that experience from a restaurant. It's clearly no longer the Italian pie need to not …More

name: Matt Wiseman
text: MY FAVORITE PIZZE PLACE IN THE ENTIRE CITY! . Takeout, dine in, all good. They have the best spinach/artichoke pizza in existence, and the service is usually one of the best i know of; friendly, quick, and attentive. My family are regulars …More

name: M Davis
text: Had the chicken cacciatore...the chicken was tough and rubbery, the onions and peppers weren't cooked, and was given very little pasta.

name: Blair Maxey
text: This place is usually pretty good but tonight while eating a chicken florentine calzone I about choked on a chicken bone. Not good. Totally ruined it for me.

name: Eric Precht
text: Pizza is good. People nice

name: Christopher Tullier
text: Great service and food is good. Prices are great for the amount of food you are served.

name: Lorin Vieira Nunes
text: THE BEST LASAGNA IVE EVER ATE! Comes with a lot of food for a reasonable price

name: Rathole630
text: GREAT PIZZA!

name: Melissa Ghassemi
text: This place is more of a to-go place than sit down although they have a huge sitting area. We all orders calzones, and I was very upset at what hey charged for mine. I asked if they offered a veggie one and she said well you can have what's …More

name: Tami Harrell Harrell
text: Enjoyed food, 1st time eating there , bread and salad included with entree.

name: Kris Wotipka
text: Excellent! Locally owned. Can't say enough good things about this place.

name: Devin Miller
text: Cute little place! Seems a bit understaffed, but they still have good service. Plenty of good food for your money.

name: Johnnie Barnes
text: We love going there and so does our grandson they are great people excellent food and great prices

name: Jamie Burns
text: Best pizza joint on this side of town

name: Devlyn Coulter

text: We go here often and the pizza is very good.

name: Michael Morse

name: Mark Lubbock

name: John Ruth

text:
So good!
Classic flavors.

text: Average Italian fare. Nothing special.
